description: Primes p such that x^62 = 2 has a solution mod p.
comments: Complement of A059646 relative to A000040. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 15 2012
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
R. J. Mathar, Maple programs for this and related sequences
mathematica: ok[p_]:= Reduce[Mod[x^62 - 2, p] == 0, x, Integers] =!= False; Select[Prime[Range[150]], ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 15 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(700) | exists(t){x : x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^62 eq 2}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 15 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
